description.full: The Games on Demand version supports English, French, Italian, German, Spanish.  A New Era of Skating Begins! Tony Hawk’s® Pro Skater™ 5 combines an epic mix of classic THPS action with combo-driven skateboarding and a state-of-the-art skatepark builder. Ride, build, and repeat!  CLASSIC TONY HAWK’S PRO SKATER GAMEPLAY • Pull off infamous Pro Skater moves and extended trick combinations. PLAY AS A PRO OR CREATE-A-SKATER • Play as one of 10 pros, including Tony Hawk, Nyjah Huston, and Aaron “Jaws” Homoki, each with their own tricks, or personalize a skater unique to your style. ENDLESS SHRED SESSIONS • Jump in and out of over 80 unique missions across 8 environments. IF YOU BUILD IT, THEY WILL SKATE • Create the sickest skateparks using over 250 obstacles.
description.short: A New Era of Skating Begins! Tony Hawk’s® Pro Skater™ 5 combines an epic mix of classic THPS action with combo-driven skateboarding and a state-of-the-art skatepark builder. Ride, build, and repeat!
